resources.string: Together we can send love to the isolated elderly and our NHS front line staff\n\n #LoveInAFewTaps
Who do you want to write to?
The recipient will NOT know it was you who sent them a letter
You can sign the letter with your name
You are writing to a gentleman who is working in the NHS.
Not sure what to write? Click here

We are all about bringing Britain together through
 our messages to the elderly in isolation
 and the NHS workers on the front line

This project uses a crowd-funding pool to make sure everyone can contribute\n\n So depending on your financial situation you can submit your letter into the pool for free or if you are 16+ and able check out the options below.
Letters in pool waiting to be sent to our NHS Frontline and isolated Elderly
Free - Submit my letter to the pool
£5 - Send mine and 2 other letters in the pool
£10 - Send mine and 4 other letters in the pool
* Please note there is no guarantee your letter will be sent.
Imagine that warm smile the gentleman on the NHS front line will have when they open your letter. We extend a genuine thank you for your time and thoughts.
Spread the word of how you\'ve helped and ask your family and friends to warm more hearts today.\n\n #LoveInAFewTaps
